com.sitewhere.spi.server.debug

Interface ITracer


  • public interface ITracer
    Pluggable debug facility that allows hierarchical data execution information to be stored for later analysis.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String asHtml()
      Returns output from trace as HTML.
